hero.title:
Transforming Lives,
Building Communities
hero.description: AWE e.V. transforms cycles of poverty and displacement into pathways of dignity, self-reliance, and lasting prosperity. We believe every person carries the seeds of their own successâour role is to provide the soil, water, and sunlight.

story.title:
Born from Experience,
Driven by Purpose
story.description1: AWE e.V. was founded in 2018 by Dr. Amara Okafor, who arrived in Germany as a refugee in 2005. Having experienced firsthand the challenges of displacement and integration, she recognized that traditional charity models often inadvertently perpetuate dependency.
story.description2: Our approach is different. We work with communities, not for them. Every program is designed to build long-term capacity, preserve dignity, and create sustainable pathways to prosperity that participants control.

transparency.description: Complete openness in our operations, finances, and impact measurement builds trust and accountability.

team.description: Our diverse leadership team brings together lived experience, academic expertise, and deep commitment to community empowerment.
